description:
Donning a wedding dress for work leads to wild ideas! The IDOLS are girls, after all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Keep Asking Until It`s All Gone / How Sweet It Is! / I`ll Leave the Line to You.
Nakunaru made Tsuzukimasu / Tottemo Sweetie...? / Serif mo Makasemasu!
無くなるまで続きます / とってもスウィーティー...? / セリフも任せます!
